author: Daniel Burke, CNN Religion Editor
title: Quarantine life is starting to feel like a real Lent
description: For many Catholics in 2020, there's less silly stuff about giving up social media and chocolates. This Lent requires real sacrifice and real isolation -- and it won't end by Easter.
content:
By Daniel Burke, CNN Religion Editor
Updated 3:01 AM ET, Sun April 5, 2020
Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.
